sqlMap.select: select a.id,a.name,a.annualmatch,a.matchid,b.name matchname,a.unitname,a.authors,a.teachers,a.description,a.content, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.updatetime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updatetime,a.state,a.memberid,a.checkuserid, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.checktime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') checktime from t_matchapply a,t_matchinfo b where a.matchid=b.id and a.isvalid=1 order by a.updatetime desc

select a.id,a.name,a.annualmatch,a.matchid,b.name matchname,a.unitname,a.authors,a.teachers,a.description,a.content, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.updatetime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updatetime,a.state,a.memberid,a.checkuserid, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(a.checktime),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') checktime from t_matchapply a,t_matchinfo b where a.matchid=b.id and a.id=#id#
select id,name from t_matchinfo t where t.isvalid=1
